ygData.subject: Thanks for the info
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to everyone that anwered my request for info. Looks like I ll be looking for netted armor first off. I am in Queynos so looks like I ll be scowering the
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to everyone that anwered my request for info. Looks like I'll be
looking for netted armor first off. I am in Queynos so looks like I'll be
scowering the sewers.. hehheh.

Hey another thing while I'm posting. What stats do the orange Headband give
you? I just got my white and it's a pretty handy item. Is it really worth
the trade from white to orange and so on? I'v e seen some crappy quests that
have you turn in stuff for really useless items.

Thanks for all the help.

Antares
Quellious & The Tribunal
